svg.title: pinchfin API Ecosystem — Data Infrastructure Map
svg.desc: Complete map of the pinchfin data services ecosystem showing 9 live APIs, 2 in-progress integrations, and 26 available data sources across 6 categories. Demonstrates institutional-grade data infrastructure with open architecture and zero vendor lock-in.
svg.text: 6 data categories · zero vendor lock-in · standard adapter pattern
Unemployment rates, wage data by MSA
CPI, GDP, interest rate time series
National Flood Hazard Layer, FIRM panels
Expense benchmarks, I/E ratios by metro and asset class
10,000+ properties · Operating cost per unit comparisons
Official USPS delivery point verification · Needs OAuth creds
Property data, sale comps, market analytics
Sales transaction data, cap rate trends
REST API · CRE app store model
75+ data points, AI forecasts to 36 months
Unified data fabric, entity resolution, SOC-2
Due diligence, knowledge graph, equity + debt
AVAILABLE — Construction, Permits, and Climate Risk
Building permits, renovation history, roof age
Physical climate risk: heat, fire, flood, wind
Geocoding, address verification, PreciselyID persistent identifier
400+ datasets, 9,000+ attributes · Demographics, property, risk, POI
Address validation, rooftop geocoding, 55 metadata points
Adding a new data source takes hours, not months. Standard adapter pattern. No workflow changes required.
Every API is replaceable — no vendor lock-in
Standard adapter pattern — new sources in hours
Data quality improves with every integration
Your existing vendor relationships plug right in
REST, GraphQL, bulk, and streaming supported
All tested against real CRE underwriting workflows
pinchfin · The Signal in the Noise
